items.title: KB Governance (Canonical Mode)
items.description: Operating rules for the canonical KB: append-only merges, CI guardrails, versioned mirrors, synonym map for search, data freshness, and conflict resolution.

items.title: CI Guardrail for KB JSONs
items.description: GitHub Action that validates JSON schema and curls RAW endpoints (`docs/*.json`) on every push. Fails the build on invalid JSON or 404.

items.title: Versioned Mirrors for KB (`docs/vN/`)
items.description: Keep immutable snapshots of `registry.json`, `cross_links.json`, and `search.json` under `docs/vN/`. Bump N per release; `docs/` always serves latest.

items.title: Synonym Map in search.json
items.description: Adds a synonyms map to improve recall and matching (e.g., seo→local seo, gbp, maps; pricing→rate, fees, cost; skid-steer→skid steer, bobcat).
